definition: sweep the snow from your own door step, don't worry about the frost on your neighbor's roof (idiom)
pinyin: ge4 ren2 zi4 sao3 men2 qian2 xue3 , mo4 guan3 ta1 jia1 wa3 shang4 shuang1
containing_words.word: 各人自扫门前雪，莫管他家瓦上霜

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本课时快要竣事，各人可以休息一会儿。

sentences.english: As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗却残害教会，进各人的家，拉着男女下在监里。

sentences.english: Marks chart shows the effect on each individual.
sentences.chinese: 马克思盘显示出其对各人的影响。

sentences.english: But to each one of us grace has been given as Christ apportioned it.
sentences.chinese: 我们各人蒙恩，都是照基督所量给各人的恩赐。

sentences.english: But to each one of us grace has been given as Christ apportioned it.
sentences.chinese: 我们各人蒙恩，都是照基督所量给各人的恩赐。

sentences.english: If each would sweep before his own door, we should have a clean city.
sentences.chinese: 如若各人自扫门前雪，那么我们的城市将会更加洁净。

sentences.english: They now walked on in silence; each of them deep in thought.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩默不作声地往前走，各人在想各人的心思。

sentences.english: They now walked on in silence; each of them deep in thought.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩默不作声地往前走，各人在想各人的心思。

sentences.english: For every man shall bear his own burden.
sentences.chinese: 因为各人总要挑他自己的担子。

sentences.english: Each of you must respect his mother and father, and you must observe my Sabbaths.
sentences.chinese: 你们各人都当孝敬父母，也要守我的安息日。

sentences.english: After having several drinks, I am going to test everyone whether you are drunk or not.
sentences.chinese: 酒过三巡后，现在要试试各人有没有醉。

sentences.english: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 我们各人蒙恩，都是照基督所量给各人的恩赐。

sentences.english: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 我们各人蒙恩，都是照基督所量给各人的恩赐。

sentences.english: Selling their possessions and goods, they gave to anyone as he had need.
sentences.chinese: 并且卖了田产家业，照各人所需用的分给各人。

sentences.english: Selling their possessions and goods, they gave to anyone as he had need.
sentences.chinese: 并且卖了田产家业，照各人所需用的分给各人。

definition: to assign (a task to different people)/to allocate
to decide/to determine/established practice/(dialect) firmly resolved (to do sth)
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
virtually the same/differing only on small points
not at all the same/substantially different
